titleStmt.title: The camp at Gilgal. Or, A view of the Kings army, and spirituall provision made for it.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Anonymous. By Henry Ferne, later Bishop of Chester (cf. Thomason catalogue).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Dr. ffierne; "about 22 June.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
